body:
Comment 2 by **kenliz@cruzio.com**: 
I've worked it down to 3 compile files, all package main, plus one run-time
Specification file, and one data file.

But I've found that by varying the amount of the data file being read, I can make the
buggy behavior of nodColr changing go away, as well as the bad values for lastCh.

So it looks like code is being stomped from somewhere else. I'll chase it some more...
